title: BRIEF-Chemed Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $3.25
text: 37 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Chemed Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $3.25 Reuters Staff Feb 14 (Reuters) - Chemed Corp: * CHEMED REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.32 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.25 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 6.2 PERCENT TO $428 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $10.60 TO $10.85 EXCLUDING ITEMS * SAYS NET REVENUE FOR VITAS WAS $292 MILLION IN Q4 OF 2017, WHICH IS AN INCREASE OF 2.8% * REVENUE GROWTH FOR VITAS IN 2018, PRIOR TO MEDICARE CAP, IS ESTIMATED TO BE IN THE RANGE OF 2.5% TO 3.5%‍​ * SAYS FULL-YEAR 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE, ESTIMATED TO BE IN RANGE OF $10.60 TO $10.85 * ADMISSIONS AND AVERAGE DAILY CENSUS IN 2018 FOR VISTAS ARE ESTIMATED TO EXPAND APPROXIMATELY 3% TO 4% ‍​ * ROTO-ROOTER IS FORECASTED TO ACHIEVE FULL-YEAR 2018 REVENUE GROWTH OF 4.0% TO 5.0%‍​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.27, REVENUE VIEW $423.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ADJUSTED EBITDA MARGIN FOR ROTO-ROOTER FOR 2018 IS ESTIMATED AT 22.3%‍​ * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $10.01 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
